snippet.title: Nintendo BS-X Gameplay
snippet.description: The Nintendo BS-X or Nintendo Stellaview was a online platform released in 1995 only in Japan. Stellaview tells the time and you could download games from the cloud such as Zelda and others. Since it’s from Japan it is pretty rare and it was pricey too, it was around ¥18,000 which is $200 in America. The service ended in 2000 and thanks to mad lads you can download Stellaview and it’s exclusive games by downloading the roms. Since the service shut down you can’t do anything but it still is really cool exploring around and hearing the calming music.
